title: Handle a Source's Request to be Anonymous
description: A source providing sensitive information will only speak if they are granted anonymity. The reporter must get an editor's approval.

tasks.description: Document the source's request for anonymity and the reasons why.
Present the request to a senior editor, explaining the importance of the source's information and the potential risks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reporter makes a case for granting anonymity.

tasks.description: The editor reviews the request against the publication's ethical guidelines for anonymous sources and gives their approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal decision is made and recorded, adhering to ethical standards.
